item.title: Fly tipping, Jews walk, 21st October
item.description:
A large amount of rubbish has been tipped on Jews Walk, on the corner of Langton Grove, including mattresses and parts of old beds. It’s on the pavement and also a large amount on the road, blocking traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jews Walk, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on road, 21st October
item.description:
On Digby Road by Homerton Station, there is loads of rubbish on the floors. Please can you have the street cleaner attend.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Berger Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish fallen out of truck, 21st October
item.description:
During the collection at Featherfew Court and Wintergreen Court yesterday, sacks fell out of the rubbish truck. There is now rubbish all over the floor, as its household waste there is a lot of food waste attracting rodents. Please have this cleaned.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Merc car parked in Doctors Bay again, 21st October
item.description:
This car parks everyday and not one ticket he is parking on a bay for a Doctor which we pay for and he continues to park free dispite been asked very nicley not to park in the permit hours of 8 -6.30 day after day he parks and no one warden
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Warwick Avenue, Maida Vale, London

item.title: Thompson Road is covered in HUGE WEEDS and they are a tripping hazard. All other roads near us have had their weeds removed - please can Thompson Road East Dulwich also have our huge weeds removed please - many thanks, 21st October
item.description:
Please remove the HUGE WEEDS in Thompson Road - they are a tripping hazard. Other roads near us have had their weeds removed - Please can our weeds be removed too asap! Thanks so much!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Thompson Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nails in Road, 21st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iris Crescent, Upper Belvedere, London
